tooltip.companionsmod.white_belt.tooltip:
Has a §b50% chance§r of dodging an attack.
The duration of the Dodge Cooldown will depend on the damage dodged.
§b15 s§r Minimum and §b90 s§r Maximum Cooldown.
tooltip.companionsmod.yellow_belt.toolti:
Can dodge the next attack.
The duration of the Dodge Cooldown will depend on the damage dodged.
§b15 s§r Minimum and §b90 s§r Maximum Cooldown.
tooltip.companionsmod.green_belt.tooltip:
Can dodge the next attack.
The duration of the Dodge Cooldown will depend on the damage dodged.
§b15 s§r Minimum and §b90 s§r Maximum Cooldown.
Applies §cStrenght I§r for §b3 s§r on dodge.
Can dodge the next attack.
The duration of the Dodge Cooldown will depend on the damage dodged.
§b15 s§r Minimum and §b90 s§r Maximum Cooldown.
Applies §cStrenght II§r for §b3 s§r on dodge.
Applies §c+20% Mov. Speed§r for §b3 s§r on dodge.
tooltip.companionsmod.red_belt.tooltip.s:
Press the §6[Parry Keybind]§r to activate a Parry effect for§b 1 s§r.
Gain Inv. Frames for§b 1 s§r after a successful parry.
The next attack will deal the minimum amount of damage possible.
Then create a Wind Ring around you that deals the damage parried to mobs in§b 4 Blocks§r around you.
The Parry has a§b 15 s§r Cooldown.

Can dodge the next attack.
The duration of the Dodge Cooldown will depend on the damage dodged.
§b15 s§r Minimum and§b 90 s§r Maximum Cooldown.
Applies §cStrength II§r for§b 3 s§r on dodge.
Applies §c+20% Mov. Speed§r for§b 3 s§r on dodge.

Cooldowns of the Dodge and Parry are shared.
tooltip.companionsmod.black_belt.tooltip:
Press the §6[Parry Keybind]§r to activate a Parry effect for§b 1 s§r.
Gain Inv. Frames for§b 1 s§r after a successful parry.
The next attack will deal the minimum amount of damage possible.
Then create a Wind Ring around you that deals the damage parried to mobs in§b 4 blocks§r around you.
The Parry has a§b 15 s§r Cooldown.

Can dodge all attacks for§b 1 s§r.
The duration of the Dodge Cooldown will depend on the biggest instance of damage dodged.
§b15 s§r Minimum and§b 90 s§r Maximum Cooldown.
Applies §cStrength II§r for§b 3 s§r on dodge.
Applies §c+20% Mov. Speed§r for§b 3 s§r on dodge.
tooltip.companionsmod.white_belt.lore: Pure and Innocent. Your determination will be put in display by your enemies.
tooltip.companionsmod.yellow_belt.lore: First steps has been made. Most people stops here.
